BODYGUARDS.Definition: people whose job was to protect him

SAWED-OFF.Definition: having a specially shortened barrel to make it easy to hide

RIPPED THROUGH.Definition: went very quickly and violently through his body

TRAMPLING.Definition: stepping on each other causing injuries

COWERED.Definition: moved backward with their head down

PROTAGONIST.Definition: the main character of the story

OUTSPOKEN.Definition: expressing his opinions openly and freely

PREACHER.Definition: a person who gave religious speeches

THREATENED.Definition: warned him that they would harm him

SERMONS.Definition: religious speeches given during church services

SUSPECTED.Definition: believed or thought that it was true

BREAKDOWN.Definition: a sudden collapse or failure of her mental health or a situation of extreme anxiety

FOSTER CARE.Definition: a situation in which for a period of time they lived with and were cared for by people who were not their parents

ASPIRATION.Definition: something that he should hope to achieve

PETTY CRIMINAL.Definition: someone who committed crimes which were not serious

DISQUALIFIED.Definition: stopped from being part of it because he wasn't suitable

SELF-RELIANCE.Definition: the quality of not needing help from other people

RENOUNCE.Definition: reject or refuse to have any dealings with

ANCESTRAL.Definition: belonging to his relatives that lived a long time ago

RECRUIT.Definition: find and persuade him to join them

RECRUITS.Definition: people who were persuaded to join

RECRUITER.Definition: a person who found and attracted new members

VICIOUSLY.Definition: in a cruel or violent manner

BEATING.Definition: the action of causing physical injuries to them

BAIL.Definition: the amount of money needed to have them released

RIOT.Definition: a violent disturbance of the public peace by a large number of people

PROMINENCE.Definition: the state of being important, famous

AT ODDS WITH.Definition: in disagreement or in conflict with

SEGREGATION.Definition: the state of setting people apart from others, separation

SCANDAL.Definition: an event that would cause public feelings of shock and anger

CHICKENS COMING HOME TO ROOST.Definition: the consequences of having done bad things

CONDOLENCES.Definition: expressions of sympathy on the occasion of his death

BALLOT.Definition: a system of voting secretly and in writing

PILGRIMAGE.Definition: a special journey for religious reasons

RENOUNCED.Definition: rejected or refused to have any dealings with

THREATS.Definition: suggestions that something bad would happen

HYPOCRITES.Definition: people who are not what they seem to be

SEVERED.Definition: cut off, separated from the body

RUMOURS.Definition: stories or reports that weren't proved to be true

PACIFISM.Definition: the belief that fighting and violence is wrong

THEOLOGIAN.Definition: a person who studied religious beliefs
